name: Dimensio
description:
Controls - 

WASD/Arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to jump dimensions.

You can collide with the boundary to have a collider force work in your favor or against!

Spamming Spacebar to change dimensions is not recommended, breaks the animation linked to the camera.

Feedback is appreciated, Not playtested it much so expect a few bugs or a lot of them!

Music/SFX assets from freesound.org, humble bundle.
